Field Detail

mil

public static org.apache.log4j.Logger mil
Public log4j Logger for MIL commands. Usage: Instead of:

cat.debug(milSB.toString());

Do this:

Util.mil.debug(milSB.toString());

milMessages is used in MonetStream to print debug info

milMessages

public static org.apache.log4j.Logger milMessages

getSchemaMajorVersion

public static int getSchemaMajorVersion()
Returns the current Proximity Three Monet database schema's major version number. Used to track a database's schema history.

Returns:
the current version as an int

getSchemaMinorVersion

public static int getSchemaMinorVersion()
Returns the current Proximity Three Monet database schema's minor version number. Used to track a database's schema history.

Returns:
the current minor version as an int

initLog4J

public static void initLog4J()
Initializes the log4j logging package, using a config file. If no config file is specified, it does basic init. Prints an info message if file is found . Does basic init if not found, and warns user.

initProxApp

public static void initProxApp()
Initializes the Proximity Application - initializes the logger

listFromPyList

public static java.util.List listFromPyList(org.python.core.PyList pyList)
Scripting utility that returns a List based on (copied from) the passed PyList. Inspired by http://bpaosf.bpa.arizona.edu/~kurtf/courses/mis507a/TiP/html/Chapter09.html

                                               char separator)
Parses the string, keeping quoted sections as a single word

Parameters:

separator -
Returns:
a list of sub-strings separated by separator, keeping quoted portions together

Returns:
